page.title: 04RELIGION IN WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: West Kilbride has one{Roman Catholic church (St Bride's) and two which belong to the{Church of Scotland}(St Andrew's and Overton). There is also the{Barony Church}which is used for the Boys' Brigade meetings and on other occasions.{"House-Church" {meetings}are also held in the Community Centre_they believe that going to people's houses brings them closer to God. Mr Mitchell is the minister of St Andrew's church and Mr Cruickshanks is the minister of Overton church. Canon Gunning is the priest of St Bride's church. There are also several{Jehovah's Witnesses}in the village _ they distrust medical science so if one of their children is sick they will often not take them to hospital,we understand. They believe that only God can cure them.
